resources.string: Password cannot be less than 8 digits
Copy and paste the contents of the keystore file of the official wallet of Ethereum to the input box, or input the QR code generated by scanning the keystore content.
Use mnemonic import to change wallet password at the same time
Enter the contents of the private key file into the input box. Please pay attention to the case of the characters.
No less than 8 characters. It is recommended to mix uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers and symbols.
One click to create your blockchain wallet, say goodbye to tediousness, and become a master from Xiaobai
Create or import decentralized wallet, safe deposit, transfer
Create BTC / EOS / usdt / etc Wallet
Support mainstream wallet assistant, private key, keystone import
Please record the mnemonics in order in a safe environment and keep them properly
Getting private key equals owning wallet asset
Use paper and pen to copy mnemonics correctly. If your phone is lost, stolen or damaged, mnemonics will recover your assets
Keep it in a safe place with isolated network. Do not share and store mnemonics in the Internet environment, such as email, photo album, social application, etc
Screenshot sharing and storage may be collected by malware, causing asset loss
Please click mnemonics in order to confirm your correct backup
